definition: Fujimori (Japanese surname)/Alberto Ken'ya Fujimori (1938-), president of Peru 1990-2000

sentences.english: She beat him by a large margin in the first round of voting.
sentences.chinese: 在首輪投票中，藤森慶子大幅領先於庫辛斯基。

sentences.english: Peruvian President Alberto Fujimori was elected in 1990, re-elected twice.
sentences.chinese: 藤森1990年當選祕魯總統，兩次連任。

sentences.english: Peru's President Fujimori to resign, Prime Minister says.
sentences.chinese: 祕魯總理透露，藤森總統即將辭職。

sentences.english: At last Alberta Fujimore knew that the game was up, and let him be taken by the police.
sentences.chinese: 最後藤森知道罪行已敗露，讓警察把他帶走了。
